original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: “Dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: ‘uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ pajahissāma, na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
analyzed: uppannam lābha sakkāra silokam pajahissāma na ca no uppannaḥ lābha sakkāra silokaḥ cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti

original: “Dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, bāḷisiko āmisagataṁ baḷisaṁ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave bāḷisikaḥ āmisa gatam baḷisam gambhīre udaka rahade pakkhipeyya
tam enam aññataraḥ āmisa cakkhu macchaḥ gileyya

original: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, maccho gilabaḷiso bāḷisikassa anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāḷisikassa.
analyzed: evam hi saḥ bhikkhave macchaḥ gilabaḷisaḥ bāḷisikassa anayam āpannaḥ byasanam āpannaḥ yathākāma karaṇīyaḥ bāḷisikassa

original: Bāḷisikoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṁ pāpimato adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: bāḷisikaḥ iti kho bhikkhave mārassa etam pāpimataḥ adhivacana
baḷisanti kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokassa itam adhivacana

original: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ assādeti nikāmeti, ayaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu uppannam lābha sakkāra silokam assādeti nikāmeti

original: vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilabaḷiso mārassa anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
analyzed: vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu gilabaḷisaḥ mārassa anayam āpannaḥ byasanam āpannaḥ yathākāma karaṇīyaḥ pāpimataḥ

original: Evaṁ dāruṇo kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: ‘uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ pajahissāma, na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
analyzed: uppannam lābha sakkāra silokam pajahissāma na ca no uppannaḥ lābha sakkāra silokaḥ cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṁ udakarahade mahākummakulaṁ ciranivāsi ahosi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave aññatarasmin udaka rahade mahā kumma kulam cira nivāsi ahosi

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, aññataro kummo aññataraṁ kummaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave aññataraḥ kummaḥ aññataram kummam etat avoca

original: ‘mā kho tvaṁ, tāta kumma, etaṁ padesaṁ agamāsī’ti.
analyzed: mā kho tva tāta kumma etam padesam agamāsi iti

original: Agamāsi kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṁ padesaṁ.
analyzed: agamāsi kho bhikkhave so kummo tam

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so kummo yena so kummo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave saḥ kummaḥ yena saḥ kummo tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṁ kummaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho bhikkhave saḥ kummaḥ tam kummam dūratas uva āgacchanta

original: ‘kacci tvaṁ, tāta kumma, na taṁ padesaṁ agamāsī’ti?
analyzed: kacci tva tāta kumma na tam padesam agamāsi iti
agamāsim khvā āha tāta kumma tam
kacci pana asi tāta kumma akkhataḥ an upahataḥ ti

original: ‘Akkhato khomhi, tāta kumma, anupahato, atthi ca me idaṁ suttakaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhan’ti.
analyzed: akkhataḥ khomhi tāta kumma an upahataḥ atthi ca me idam suttakam piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ anubandhanti
tagghasi tāta kumma khataḥ taggha upahataḥ

original: Etena hi te, tāta kumma, suttakena pitaro ca pitāmahā ca anayaṁ āpannā byasanaṁ āpannā.
analyzed: etena hi te tāta kumma suttakena pitaraḥ ca pitāmahā ca anayam āpannāḥ byasanam āpannā

original: Gaccha dāni tvaṁ, tāta kumma, na dāni tvaṁ amhākan’ti.
analyzed: gaccha dāni tva tāta kumma na dāni tvam amhākanti

original: Luddoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṁ pāpimato adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: luddaḥ iti kho bhikkhave mārassa etam pāpimataḥ adhivacana
papatāti kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokassa itam adhivacana
suttakam ti kho bhikkhave nandī rāgassa itam adhivacana

original: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ assādeti nikāmeti—
analyzed: yaḥ hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu uppannam lābha sakkāra silokam assādeti nikāmeti

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papatāya anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu giddhaḥ papatāya anayam āpannaḥ byasanam āpannaḥ yathākāma karaṇīyaḥ pāpimataḥ
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dīghalomikā eḷakā kaṇṭakagahanaṁ paviseyya.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhikkhave dīghalomikā eḷakā kaṇṭaka gahanam paviseyya

original: Sā tatra tatra sajjeyya, tatra tatra gayheyya, tatra tatra bajjheyya, tatra tatra anayabyasanaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: sā tatra tatra sajjeyya tatra tatra gayheyya tatra tatra bajjheyya tatra tatra anaya byasanam āpajjeyya

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādiṇṇa cittaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisati

original: So tatra tatra sajjati, tatra tatra gayhati, tatra tatra bajjhati, tatra tatra anayabyasanaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: saḥ tatra tatra sajjati tatra tatra gayhati tatra tatra bajjhati tatra tatra anaya byasanam āpajjati
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mīḷhakā gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa. Purato cassa mahāgūthapuñjo.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mīḷhakā gūtha ādī gūtha pūrā puṇṇā gūthassa puratas ca ssa mahā gūtha puñjaḥ

original: ‘ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato ca myāyaṁ mahāgūthapuñjo’ti.
analyzed: ahamhi gūtha ādī gūtha pūrā puṇṇā gūthassa puratas ca myāyam mahā gūtha puñjā iti

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādiṇṇa cittaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisati

original: So tattha bhuttāvī ca hoti yāvadattho, nimantito ca svātanāya, piṇḍapāto cassa pūro.
analyzed: so tattha bhuttāvī ca hoti yāvadattho nimantito ca svātanāya piṇḍapāto ca ssa pūro

original: So ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe vikatthati:
analyzed: so ārāmam gantvā bhikkhu gaṇassa majjhe vikatthati

original: ‘bhuttāvī camhi yāvadattho, nimantito camhi svātanāya, piṇḍapāto ca myāyaṁ pūro,
analyzed: bhuttāvī camhi yāvadatthaḥ nimantito camhi piṇḍapāto ca
lābhī camhi cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārāna ime pana aññe
bhikkhū appapuññāḥ appesakkhāḥ na lābhinaḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārānanti

original: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
analyzed: so tena lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādiṇṇa citto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati

original: Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
analyzed: tat hi tassa bhikkhave mogha purisassa hoti dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Kaṁ, bhikkhave, asanivicakkaṁ āgacchatu, sekhaṁ appattamānasaṁ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu.
analyzed: ka bhikkhave asanivicakkam āgacchatu sekham appatta mānasam lābha sakkāra silokaḥ anupāpuṇātu
kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokassa itam adhivacana
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe

original: Kaṁ, bhikkhave, diddhagatena visallena sallena vijjhatu, sekhaṁ appattamānasaṁ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu.

sallanti kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokassa itam adhivacana
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassā”ti?
analyzed: no tumhe bhikkhave rattiyā paccūsa samayam jarasiṅgālassa vassamānassa ati

original: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena nāma rogajātena phuṭṭho neva bilagato ramati, na rukkhamūlagato ramati, na ajjhokāsagato ramati;
analyzed: esaḥ kho bhikkhave jarasiṅgālaḥ ukkaṇḍakena nāma roga jātena phuṭṭhaḥ na iva bila gataḥ ramati na rukkha mūla gataḥ ramati na ajjhokāsa gataḥ ramati

original: yena yena gacchati, yattha yattha tiṭṭhati, yattha yattha nisīdati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasanaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: yena yena gacchati yattha yattha tiṭṭhati yattha yattha nisīdati yattha yattha nipajjati tattha tattha anaya byasanam āpajjati

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto neva suññāgāragato ramati, na rukkhamūlagato ramati, na ajjhokāsagato ramati;
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādiṇṇa cittaḥ na iva suññāgāra gataḥ ramati na rukkha mūla gataḥ ramati na ajjhokāsa gataḥ ramati

original: yena yena gacchati, yattha yattha tiṭṭhati, yattha yattha nisīdati, yattha yattha nipajjati; tattha tattha anayabyasanaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: yena yena gacchati yattha yattha tiṭṭhati yattha yattha nisīdati yattha yattha nipajjati tattha tattha anaya byasanam āpajjati
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Upari, bhikkhave, ākāse verambhā nāma vātā vāyanti.
analyzed: upari bhikkhave ākāse verambhāḥ nāma vātāḥ vāyanti

original: Tattha yo pakkhī gacchati tamenaṁ verambhā vātā khipanti.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ pakkhī gacchati tam enam verambhāḥ vātāḥ khipanti

original: Tassa verambhavātakkhittassa aññeneva pādā gacchanti, aññena pakkhā gacchanti, aññena sīsaṁ gacchati, aññena kāyo gacchati.
analyzed: tassa verambha vāta khittassa aññena iva pādāḥ gacchanti aññena pakkhāḥ gacchanti aññena sīsam gacchati aññena kāyaḥ gacchati

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādiṇṇa citto

original: pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati
analyzed: pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisati

original: arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena, anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā,
analyzed: a rakkhitena iva kāyena a rakkhitāya vācāya a rakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā

original: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
analyzed: saḥ tattha passati mātugāmam dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā

original: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tassa mātugāmam disvā dunnivattham vā duppārutam vā rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: so rāga an uddhasitena cittena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Tassa aññe cīvaraṁ haranti, aññe pattaṁ haranti, aññe nisīdanaṁ haranti, aññe sūcigharaṁ haranti, verambhavātakkhittasseva sakuṇassa.
analyzed: tassa aññe cīvaram haranti aññe pattam haranti aññe nisīdanam haranti aññe sūci gharam haranti verambha vāta kkhittassa iva sakuṇassa
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe
dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe adhigamāya

original: Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi sakkārena abhibhūtaṁ pariyādiṇṇacittaṁ, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannaṁ.
analyzed: idha āha bhikkhave ekaccam puggalam passāmi sakkārena abhibhūtam pariyādiṇṇa citta kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapanna

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi asakkārena abhibhūtaṁ pariyādiṇṇacittaṁ, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannaṁ.

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi sakkārena ca asakkārena ca tadubhayena
analyzed: idha pana aha bhikkhave ekaccam puggalam passāmi sakkārena ca asakkārena ca tad ubhayena

original: abhibhūtaṁ pariyādiṇṇacittaṁ, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannaṁ.
analyzed: abhibhūtam kāyassa bhedāḥ param maraṇāḥ apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapanna
evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ pe

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:

original: ‘na cāyamāyasmā rūpiyapātiyāpi suvaṇṇacuṇṇaparipūrāya hetu sampajānamusā bhāseyyā’ti.

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:

original: Tena kho pana samayena devadattassa ajātasattukumāro pañcahi rathasatehi sāyaṁ pātaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ gacchati, pañca ca thālipākasatāni bhattābhihāro abhiharīyati.

original: “Dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: idha aha bhikkhave ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi
na ca ayam āyasmā mātupi hetu

original: Tamenaṁ passāmi aparena samayena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūtaṁ pariyādiṇṇacittaṁ sampajānamusā bhāsantaṁ.
analyzed: tam enam passāmi aparena samayena lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtam pariyādiṇṇa cittam sampajāna musā bhāsanta

original: Evaṁ dāruṇo kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
analyzed: na ca no uppannaḥ lābha sakkāra silokaḥ cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti

original: “Dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: dāruṇaḥ bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: idha aha bhikkhave ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi
na ca ayam āyasmā pitupi he tu pe
pajāpatiyā api hetu sampajāna musā bhāseyya ati

original: Tamenaṁ passāmi aparena samayena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūtaṁ pariyādiṇṇacittaṁ sampajānamusā bhāsantaṁ.
analyzed: tam enam passāmi aparena samayena lābha sakkāra silokena abhibhūtam pariyādiṇṇa cittam sampajāna musā bhāsanta

original: Evaṁ dāruṇo kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: evam dāruṇaḥ kho bhikkhave lābha sakkāra silokaḥ kaṭukaḥ pharusaḥ antarāyikaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: ‘uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ pajahissāma, na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatī’ti.
analyzed: uppannam lābha sakkāra silokam pajahissāma na ca no uppannaḥ lābha sakkāra silokaḥ cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti
